title: Area having developmental prohibition or restrictions imposed by any notification issued under the provisions of any Central / State Act (like CRZ regulations, Defense restriction areas, etc
clause_text: Area having developmental prohibition or restrictions imposed by any notification issued under the provisions of any Central / State Act (like CRZ regulations, Defense restriction areas, etc.) or under these regulations. Koregaon Park area in Pune Municipal Corporation area.
section: Areas Restricted from Utilisation of Transferable Development Rights (TDR)
